item.title: How to add me on periscope
item.description: Periscope is a relatively new tool that allows you to broadcast what you see from anywhere you have internet connection.

item.title: Personal Empowerment Primer Free eBook
item.description: May I send you a copy of the personal empowerment primer – ebook edition. There is no cost to get a copy. All I ask is that you sign up for my newsletter.

item.title: Pursuit of happiness
item.description: Norwegian countries seem to be rated the most happy. Why is that. A better question is why is there so much focus on happiness and the pursuit of happiness.

item.title: contact
item.description: I would love to hear from you contact-form to='paris@parisalaw.

item.title: Everyday Happiness starts in our DNA: Can we really do anything about it?
item.description: “Very little is needed to make a happy life; it is all within yourself, in your way of thinking.
